skilllist.skilldesc:
Every time Badang's Basic Attack hits a target, he gains a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Chivalry Fist</font>. After gaining 4 stacks, his next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and knocks them back. Enemies that are knocked into obstacles will be stunned for 0.6s (Minions and Creeps are stunned directly).
<font color="a6aafb">Fist Wind</font> generated by Badang's skills will trigger this effect directly, and <font color="a6aafb">Fist Wind</font> from his Ultimate increases the stun duration to 1s.

Badang unleashes a gust of <font color="a6aafb">Fist Wind</font> in the target direction, dealing 125<font color="fba51f"> (+90% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit, slowing them by 30% for 1.5s, and knocking them back. The <font color="a6aafb">Fist Wind</font> will explode upon hitting an obstacle, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies. <font color="a6aafb">Fist Wind</font> can trigger attack effects and grants Badang 1 <font color="a6aafb">Chivalry Fist</font> stack upon cast.
Badang stores up to 2 <font color="a6aafb">Fist Wind</font> charges and restores 1 charge every 10.4s.

Badang dashes in the target direction, dealing 230<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in his path while gaining a 350<font color="fba51f"> (+150% Total Physical Attack)</font> shield that lasts 5s. He stops immediately upon hitting an enemy hero, slightly knocking them back while creating an obstacle that lasts 4s behind them. Enemies hit by the obstacle are dealt 130<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Badang removes the obstacle he created.

Badang throws a flurry of punches in the target direction, dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+54% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit multiple times (can trigger attack effects). The <font color="a6aafb">Fist Wind</font> generated by the punches will explode upon hitting an obstacle, dealing 30<font color="fba51f"> (+27% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies.
Badang is immune to control effects for the duration.

data.name: Badang

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Deadly in 1v1. Stay close to walls for more damage and CC.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by <%Num2> for <Num1>s and restores <Num3> HP (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+8% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
equiplist.equipskill2: Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

recommendmasterplan.name: XK Penjahat
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

recommendmasterplan.name: uino_thant_ez9
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: Island hero who gained supernatural power after defeating the water monster.

assist.desc: Badang works best with heroes that can pull enemies together to make it easier for him to land his 2nd Skill and Ultimate combo, such as Tigreal and Luo Yi.

strong.desc: Badang counters squishy heroes with low mobility like Layla and Odette who have a hard time escaping from his 2nd Skill into Ultimate combo.

weak.desc: Badang is countered by agile heroes such as Wanwan and Ling who can dodge or escape his 2nd Skill, greatly diminishing his damage and CC.
